name: Spider-Man (Marvel Zombies)
description: Zombie Spider-Man ate his own wife and aunt, the only two people left in the world who truly loved him.

wiki.identity: Secret, known to certain government officials , known to some family members, certain enemies
wiki.education: College graduate (biophysics major), doctorate studies in biochemistry (incomplete)
wiki.relatives: Richard Parker (father, deceased), Mary Parker (mother, deceased), Benjamin Parker (uncle, deceased), May Parker (aunt, deceased, eaten by Spider-Man), Will Fitzpatrick (grandfather, presumably deceased or infected), Mary Jane Watson-Parker (wife, deceased, eaten by Spider-Man), May Parker (daughter, deceased),
wiki.powers: Peter can cling to most surfaces, has enhanced strength and is about 15 times faster than a regular human. His spider-sense provides an early warning detection system linked with his superhuman reflexes. Peter also posseses cosmic powers but to a lesser degree than the Silver Surfer.
wiki.abilities: Peter is an accomplished scientist, inventor and photographer.
wiki.bio_text: It all started with a flash in the sky and a ripple through the clouds. Nobody knew what exactly caused this, but some think it might have been a punch. The hunger had made the unknown super hero so determined to satisfy his hunger that he ripped a hole in the very fabric of reality.
wiki.bio:
It all started with a flash in the sky and a ripple through the clouds. Nobody knew what exactly caused this, but some think it might have been a punch. The hunger had made the unknown super hero so determined to satisfy his hunger that he ripped a hole in the very fabric of reality.

A hunger so insatiable, it caused Spider-Man to eat his own wife and aunt, the only two people left in the world who truly loved him.

When Mister Fantastic's plan to lure his other dimensional counterpart to their world failed, and Magneto destroyed the machine that could take them to the other dimension, they needed food. When the Silver Surfer arrived to inform the zombies that Galactus would shortly be arriving to consume their world, they ate the Surfer, each gaining some of his cosmic powers.

The zombies then devised a way to attack Galactus using a machine that would combine their cosmic blasts. It seriously hurt Galactus, and they then had a skirmish with the villains in which they apparently stopped them.

They each ate a portion of Galactus, in turn becoming like him.Also, they had the ability destroy planets and live in the vaccum of space.

When the survivors had returned from the ultimate dimension, they noticed that the zombies disappeared.But, they returned and spiderman was killed by Forge and the Black Panther.
